remarks.format: ## Remarks 请记住， 对象会在调用之间保存状态 。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 当应用程序使用数据流完成时，它应将参数设置为， `flush` `true` 以确保刷新状态信息。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 通过此设置，解码器将忽略数据块末尾的无效字节，并清除内部缓冲区。With this setting, the decoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 逻辑单元中的所有剩余处理的数据（如代理项对的高代理项）都根据当前的回退设置进行转换。Any remaining processed data that is part of a logical unit, such as the high surrogate of a surrogate pair, is converted according to the current fallback settings. `Convert`方法旨在在循环中用于对任意数量的输入（如从文件或流中读取的数据）进行解码。The `Convert` method is designed to be used in a loop to decode an arbitrary amount of input, such as data read from a file or stream. 它将解码操作的输出存储在固定大小的缓冲区中。It stores the output of the decoding operation in a fixed-size buffer. 如果输出缓冲区不够大，将会引发异常，但 将填满尽可能多的空间并返回读取的字节以及写入的字符，前提是输出数组至少允许两个字符。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the bytes read and chars written, provided the output array allows for at least two characters. 另请参阅 获取更多注释。Also see for more comments.
